summary: Contoso Wireless offers fast, reliable, and secure internet service with speeds ranging from 100 Mbps up to 1 Gbps depending on location and plan selection. They have competitive pricing plans that start at just $39.99 per month, as well as promotional discounts for new customers and special deals for students, seniors, and military personnel. Customers are also protected by a 30-day money-back guarantee and have access to 24/7 customer support.
